overview_of_class:
String Quartets Dialogues

This course will examine works from the past and present by combining a broad range of technical analysis with readings in pursuit of better understanding the string quartet genre. The course will focus on works that exhibit a particularly dialogic nature - works that conspicuously create a discourse with other works and other artists from the past and/or present. (Artists to be discussed include: Haydn, Beethoven, Ives, Schoenberg, Webern, Cage, Carter, Ferneyhough, Lachenmann, G. F. Haas, K. Soper.)
name: Topics in Contemporary Repertoire
title: MUSIC MUS_COMP 437-0-20 Topics in Contemporary Repertoire
